subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: “I will take you and the memory of you with me for the rest of my life,” Andre Agassi told the fans at Arthur Ashe Stadium after his loss to Benjamin Becker.
snippet: “I will take you and the memory of you with me for the rest of my life,” Andre Agassi told the fans at Arthur Ashe Stadium after his loss to Benjamin Becker.
